title: [SUMMARY] all daily hot topics on LIHKG in one post 7/10

replies.msg:
This is a summary post for all the hot topics on LIHKG forum today, we will try our best to translate all the posts and explain most of them.

Please note that the system this forum uses to pick the hot topics is based on the viewing times and discuss rate of one post. Therefore it does not mean we all agree with what the person is saying even if it got on as hot topic. Most terms will be translated literally, when some terms don't make much sense after translation, the meaning would be put in bracket for easy reading.

[真核彈]今次美軍仲忍到？
https://lih.kg/1636349
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

Topic: [real nuclear (hidden dirt)] Could US really hold it back this time?

Those maggots support 911，even said they love 911！！！
Let me help you place the post in a prominent position

Come on, my friends

Let's see how the people of Chinazi they see the 9.11 terrorism attack

一個藍到發黑，見到黃fd比人捉仲幸災樂禍嘅人。
https://lihkg.com/thread/1636469/page/1

Topic: One person who is blue* to the point of black, seeing a yellow** friend being arrested can still gloat.

*Blue - colour representing someone who is pro-government/police
**Yellow - colour representing someone who are pro-democracy and anti-authoritarian

Here is the thing
My friend has been arrest today
When everyone is discussing reporting his IG (instagram in short)
Helping him to find a lawyer

[A brief description on the image: basically the person in question has posted his schoolmate on IG story who has just been arrested, telling him “ fuck your mother right in her cunt, how have you got the right to tell others (should be referring to police) to study when you have not even graduated. “]
This asshole is here gloating
I am still unclear of his background
[red]but his older brother is definitely a police officer/red]
When doing human chain (inspired by the Baltic Way) he is always late.
Because he is afraid of being called out as blue
I hope today when brothers (a Chinese word lit. means one's own hands and legs) have finished work
Go and greet him if you have spare time
Remind him to go to school on time

IG：Cht_pudding

#his girlfriend IG is public

Topic: Help Stand News, adopt (as in adopting a child) Stand News.

Stand News - (quoted from Wikipedia) Stand News is a free, not-for-profit pro-democracy online news website based in Hong Kong, founded in December 2014 as the successor of House News. It primarily focuses on social and political issues in Hong Kong.
(My note) Stand News has also been live streaming the protesting events and considered to be much more neutral in terms of their reporting. This has also got them in troubles during live streaming, just today one of their crew members has been hit by the police.

Help to donate money to Stand News please, I have already donated, have you donated yet today?

link: https://mystand.thestandnews.com/payonce/


(a brief description on the photo - it talks about one of their reporters Mr. Hong who has been live streaming ever since it all begins. He talked about difficulty of continuing live streaming while he was reporting live in Prince Edwards. The post has also reminded people how another reporter Mr. Sing would speak out to try to stop the police from beating up protesters while protesters are being arrested.)

警方 ： 的士內2萬現金及14萬手錶不見 案件列為盜竊案等處理 無人被捕
https://lihkg.com/thread/1636212/page/1

Topic: There was 20,000 cash Hong Kong dollars and a watch worth 140,000 Hong Kong dollars missing from the Taxi. The case has been listed as robbery and pending for processing. No one has been arrested.

Netizen on Sunday (06/10) has called for demonstration against the anti-mask law. The same day at around 17:00, at the crossing of Cheung Sha Wan Road and Yen Chow Street in Sham Shui Po, a taxi has driven onto pedestrian's walk, people have been run over and injured, the driver has also been beaten up. The police has reported that the taxi involved have around 20,000 cash Hong Kong dollars and a watch worth around 140,000 HKD gone missing. Upon preliminary investigation, the case has been listed as riot, wounding or striking with intent, property damage, robbery, and traffic accident causing bodily harms, no one has been arrested at this point.

Topic: Police: People who were watching have been clapping and cheering, voicing support to the misdeed of rioters, it is bone chilling

The police was dispersing the crowd at Tong Tak Street in Tseung Kwan O when a protester has thrown down a bike from above. The falling bike has landed on the head of one of the police officers and crashed him to the ground. He was escorted away by his comrades. The injured police officer has taken damage on the head and neck and has been sent to hospital for treatment. The police has strongly denounced the violent actions of the protesters that are neglecting others' safety. The police further denounced the people who were watching clapping and cheering, voicing support to the misdeed of rioters, which is bone chilling. The police has called for people to leave public gathering immediately.
I really need to sleep before I turn into a zombie tomorrow, please take over anyone who may accidentally read this post. Thanks

https://lihkg.com/thread/1637218/page/1

Topic: Listen to me, Tseung Kwan O is literally a great place for playing with dog (police)

Seeing today the mightiness of brother throwing down a bike, a sudden thought came up, I found out that Tseung Kwan O district is basically the perfect place for playing with dogs. Even the stronghold for pro-democracy camp has its time to shine！

First of all, Tseung Kwan O mainly has four stations (excluding rubbish Lohas Park). Po Lam, Hang Hau, Tseung Kwan O, and Tiu Keng Leng. The distance between each station is not too far, each station is within ten minutes walk away from one another. If brothers are taking on the MTR stations they could go straight to one after one. (Even though all the stations have been done with already)

Secondly, Tseung Kwan O brothers would know about this, the whole Tseung Kwan O is filled with shopping centres, 3 in Po Lam, 5 in Hang Hau, around 4 in Tseung Kwan O but I am uncertain with that, 3 in Tiu Keng Leng.
What is the characteristic in this? All the shopping centres amongst the stations are connected！All of them lead back to housing estates! If you get tired after playing with dogs, you could go right back into shopping centres and back home! Popo can play with themselves with all they want.

Thirdly, everyone should know Tseung Kwan O district is composed of mainly housing estates, if to play with dogs, there are as many as needed! Going down onto streets immediately in resident's looks to play with them!

Fourthly, most shops in Tseung Kwan O are part of retail chains, and many of them are owned by Link REIT If anything happens they would be closing and those large proprietors would bear the loss themselves. Those small local stores would not be as highly affected.

Fifthly, If Popo does not have enough people and needed for back ups, there is only one way into Tseung Kwan O, which is the Tseung Kwan O Tunnel (only if the popo is insane to the point they would take hiking path) And do you know what is next to Tseung Kwan O tunnel? Yes, they are again housing estates, the Tsui Lam Estate. Tsui Lam Estate's brothers would see popo cars coming in from Tseung Kwan O tunnel and report immediately! All brothers could be casually going back home to sleep!

ps*: born and raised in Tseung Kwan O

Tseung Kwan O people! resist!


利申 - lit. Declaration of financial interests, it is used by us to clarify our position for knowing something.

林鄭月娥：暴力行為已到無底線無法無天 政府決心制止
https://lihkg.com/thread/1637181/page/1

Topic: Carrie Lam: the violent action has gone with no border line, lawless. The government is determined to stop this.

Chief Executive Carrie Lam has express, over the last long weekend, serious and widely spread violent actions have been sighted in each district. She points out that their actions are with intention, stopping the railway system affecting citizens' daily life. They are also targeting shops to be destroyed, causing a huge panic if one enterprise or shop has expressed opinions that dissatisfy them, they would attack the shops under that enterprise, spreading terror and causing Hong Kong unable to return to peace.

Carrie Lam also points out, anyone cannot carry out extrajudicial execution, but she is still seeing people cruelly beating up others.

She also points out the web has videos showing rioters stopping vehicles for car searches. She says it is extremely unlawful and is causing Hong Kong to enter into a dangerous situation. Describing the violence has now gone with no border line and lawless, the government is largely determined to stop the violence, causing retail and hospitality service industry to be largely impacted and low income employees to have no work and no earning.


**The last paragraph seems a bit off, not sure if I have misread anything but I am just translating it literally, 巴打如果理解到幫我譯返啱佢呀。

【新屋嶺已停用 但隔離「新疆嶺」即將啟用!】
https://lihkg.com/thread/1637196/page/1

Topic: [San UK Ling has already been out of use, but the next up “ Xinjiang Ling“ will come in play soon]
Xinjiang Ling 新疆嶺 is a Cantonese word play on San Uk Ling 新屋嶺
San Uk Ling, a holding centre in remote area that has been reported to have many inhumane acts imposed by police on arrested protesters.

[San UK Ling has already been out of use, but the next up “ Xinjiang Ling“ will come in play soon]

It has come to very few attention, the government has taken 1.9 billion HKD fund at the beginning of anti-ELAB movement on a new facility that is 10 - 15 times bigger than San Uk Ling which focuses on anti-terrorism. This work will be an important step for Hong Kong to be Xinjiang-fied.

--Building a “ Xinjiang Ling“ ?--

Now the government has plans to flatten a 19 hectares hills at Kong Nga Po which is near San Uk Ling. It would be a large as the Victoria Park. It has been specified as a comprehensive anti-terrorism police training facility site. That means a huge anti-terrorism base like in Xinjiang (ref. 1), making an isolated “ Xinjiang Ling“ .

At the moment what would be in Xinjiang Ling? Very little information has been disclosed to public for now. But accordingly to an architectural drawing submitted for environmental evaluation (ref. 2), it can be seen there will be large training ground for police car driving, a site for testing vehicles, large shooting training range, helipad, and yet to be specified in terms of usage “gun weapons training facility“ , “multi-levels training building“ , “police training facility“ All in one. But no one knows what exactly these are for at this point.

LegCo member Au Nok-Hin and Raymond Chan have both pursued asking (ref. 3), only then they have specified a little bit more details on these “special operations training facility. They call it to be “a professional facility used on training anti-terrorism or other professional operations high-level strategy“ There will be simulated urban environment as training ground, even still very unspecific. And the gun weapons training facility is a relocation of all nearby shooting ranges as one large range. Where training of pistols, rifles, and shotguns shooting would take place. Also they will relocate the water cannon vehicle from Fan Ling Fan Garden into the anti-terrorism base. That would mean all these water cannon vehicles, “sound wave cannon“ which is installed on Unimog U5000 vehicle, could now be trained relentlessly without the public knowing.

There is no Bin Laden in Hong Kong, so their so-called anti-terrorist operation training is obviously used to target general demonstrations held by normal citizens.

--merging with San Uk Ling?--

Strangely, the explanation of Xinjiang Ling made by government has only focused on relocating the nearby shooting ranges, parking lots, and training grounds. But in the latest “Xinjiang Ling“ proposal, San Uk Ling's holding centre and its shooting range have not been relocated into the development plan.

So if to be asked, we need to know that Lam has advised that San Uk Ling has been “out of use", whether she means it has been suspended or withdrawn? If it is not “permanently out of use“, then it is most likely to be meged with Xinjiang Ling to portray a new function that is coordinated with the anti-terrorism base. Would the facility within this be oriented like the “re-education camp“ in Xinjiang? OR another New Territory version of “Guantanamo Bay detention camp“, an isolated extrajudicial ground?

*****to be continued
I wholeheartedly thank you for everything.
Push
Push
Push

quote.msg:
【新屋嶺已停用 但隔離「新疆嶺」即將啟用!】
https://lihkg.com/thread/1637196/page/1

Topic: [San UK Ling has already been out of use, but the next up “ Xinjiang Ling“ will come in play soon]
Xinjiang Ling 新疆嶺 is a Cantonese word play on San Uk Ling 新屋嶺
San Uk Ling, a holding centre in remote area that has been reported to have many inhumane acts imposed by police on arrested protesters.

[San UK Ling has already been out of use, but the next up “ Xinjiang Ling“ will come in play soon]

It has come to very few attention, the government has taken 1.9 billion HKD fund at the beginning of anti-ELAB movement on a new facility that is 10 - 15 times bigger than San Uk Ling which focuses on anti-terrorism. This work will be an important step for Hong Kong to be Xinjiang-fied.

--Building a “ Xinjiang Ling“ ?--

Now the government has plans to flatten a 19 hectares hills at Kong Nga Po which is near San Uk Ling. It would be a large as the Victoria Park. It has been specified as a comprehensive anti-terrorism police training facility site. That means a huge anti-terrorism base like in Xinjiang (ref. 1), making an isolated “ Xinjiang Ling“ .

At the moment what would be in Xinjiang Ling? Very little information has been disclosed to public for now. But accordingly to an architectural drawing submitted for environmental evaluation (ref. 2), it can be seen there will be large training ground for police car driving, a site for testing vehicles, large shooting training range, helipad, and yet to be specified in terms of usage “gun weapons training facility“ , “multi-levels training building“ , “police training facility“ All in one. But no one knows what exactly these are for at this point.

LegCo member Au Nok-Hin and Raymond Chan have both pursued asking (ref. 3), only then they have specified a little bit more details on these “special operations training facility. They call it to be “a professional facility used on training anti-terrorism or other professional operations high-level strategy“ There will be simulated urban environment as training ground, even still very unspecific. And the gun weapons training facility is a relocation of all nearby shooting ranges as one large range. Where training of pistols, rifles, and shotguns shooting would take place. Also they will relocate the water cannon vehicle from Fan Ling Fan Garden into the anti-terrorism base. That would mean all these water cannon vehicles, “sound wave cannon“ which is installed on Unimog U5000 vehicle, could now be trained relentlessly without the public knowing.

There is no Bin Laden in Hong Kong, so their so-called anti-terrorist operation training is obviously used to target general demonstrations held by normal citizens.

--merging with San Uk Ling?--

Strangely, the explanation of Xinjiang Ling made by government has only focused on relocating the nearby shooting ranges, parking lots, and training grounds. But in the latest “Xinjiang Ling“ proposal, San Uk Ling's holding centre and its shooting range have not been relocated into the development plan.

So if to be asked, we need to know that Lam has advised that San Uk Ling has been “out of use", whether she means it has been suspended or withdrawn? If it is not “permanently out of use“, then it is most likely to be meged with Xinjiang Ling to portray a new function that is coordinated with the anti-terrorism base. Would the facility within this be oriented like the “re-education camp“ in Xinjiang? OR another New Territory version of “Guantanamo Bay detention camp“, an isolated extrajudicial ground?

*****to be continued

replies.msg:
--New territory into Xinjiang?--
(again, there is a small word play in this)

Bring back to December, 2018 when the Secretary for Security, John Lee, was visiting the Xinjiang anti-terrorism facility for field study. He was exactly visiting the anti-terrorism training facility, and mentioned that it was worth learning from after returning to Hong Kong (ref. 4). Just before the sentence was finished, in January, 2019 Kong Nga Po has a new Xinjiang Ling anti-terrorism base planning being put onto Legco for funds.

Our researchers have even found that as early as in July, 2016 (ref.5), Hong Kong police has already had a 4 days long in-depth exchange and learning program with the Xinjiang authority. Especially on “Emergency responsive strategy in order to improve the quality of prison management“, they have proudly uploaded photos onto Facebook.

At the end, we would leave to you to think whether they are relocating the experience in Xinjiang into New Territory or not.

--Why no one knows about this?--

It is not without reason that this plan has now been known by many. Because the government is good at playing with procedures, the entire project has been stuffed into the HKD 33.5 billion North-east New Territory funding, causing the media to focus onto forceful removal of villages and Real Estate tycoon disputes, where this Xinjiang Ling anti-terrorism base has been largely neglected.

The government has also learnt to put the description of anti-terrorism base in footnotes, making the font size hardly noticeable, when everyone is focusing on Anti-ELAB movement this May, they have easily took the fund of 1.9 billion to flatten the field. The bidding documents indicate that this November the developers would start working. (ref. 6)

Now, only just the land flattening in pre-development phase cost 1.9 billion, we are talking about an anti-terrorism standard of police facility, the estimate cost could be more than 10 billions at the end with no surprise. Till now, the cost for anti-terrorism base facility has no specific estimation, they are expecting after the land is flattened they could force into having the development fund for facility as well.

--Rejecting the Xingjiang Ling--

Right now, police force is using citizens on street around 18 districts as their shooting target training, playing vehicle drifting on crossroad, all sort of gun weapons have been trained already, there is definitely no need for a training base like this. Only thing is that killing weapons like the water cannon vehicles, sound wave blast cannon vehicles, if a remote area has been designated for them to practice insanely, their lethal force would not just be the level we see today. Therefore this tens of billion dollars anti-terrorist facility that will be used to abusecitizens must be opposed.

If the anti-terrorism base has no need and the land has been flattened already, the most practical resolution is to move the 18 Hectares Wong Chuk Hang police training school into there. Emptying an urban area for other land use, it is estimated that it could contain 1.3 (sic) residential unit to solve housing problem (ref. 7) The area in Hung Lung Hang should be reserved for Special Tactical Squad, otherwise they should not let them to develop anything there.

to be continued again

LegCo member Au Nok-Hin and Raymond Chan have both pursued asking (ref. 3), only then they have specified a little bit more details on these “special operations training facility. They call it to be “a professional facility used on training anti-terrorism or other professional operations high-level strategy“ There will be simulated urban environment as training ground, even still very unspecific. And the gun weapons training facility is a relocation of all nearby shooting ranges as one large range. Where training of pistols, rifles, and shotguns shooting would take place. Also they will relocate the water cannon vehicle from Fan Ling Fan Garden into the anti-terrorism base. That would mean all these water cannon vehicles, “sound wave cannon“ which is installed on Unimog U5000 vehicle, could now be trained relentlessly without the public knowing.

There is no Bin Laden in Hong Kong, so their so-called anti-terrorist operation training is obviously used to target general demonstrations held by normal citizens.

--merging with San Uk Ling?--

Strangely, the explanation of Xinjiang Ling made by government has only focused on relocating the nearby shooting ranges, parking lots, and training grounds. But in the latest “Xinjiang Ling“ proposal, San Uk Ling's holding centre and its shooting range have not been relocated into the development plan.

So if to be asked, we need to know that Lam has advised that San Uk Ling has been “out of use", whether she means it has been suspended or withdrawn? If it is not “permanently out of use“, then it is most likely to be meged with Xinjiang Ling to portray a new function that is coordinated with the anti-terrorism base. Would the facility within this be oriented like the “re-education camp“ in Xinjiang? OR another New Territory version of “Guantanamo Bay detention camp“, an isolated extrajudicial ground?

*****to be continued

--New territory into Xinjiang?--
(again, there is a small word play in this)

Bring back to December, 2018 when the Secretary for Security, John Lee, was visiting the Xinjiang anti-terrorism facility for field study. He was exactly visiting the anti-terrorism training facility, and mentioned that it was worth learning from after returning to Hong Kong (ref. 4). Just before the sentence was finished, in January, 2019 Kong Nga Po has a new Xinjiang Ling anti-terrorism base planning being put onto Legco for funds.

Our researchers have even found that as early as in July, 2016 (ref.5), Hong Kong police has already had a 4 days long in-depth exchange and learning program with the Xinjiang authority. Especially on “Emergency responsive strategy in order to improve the quality of prison management“, they have proudly uploaded photos onto Facebook.

At the end, we would leave to you to think whether they are relocating the experience in Xinjiang into New Territory or not.

--Why no one knows about this?--

It is not without reason that this plan has now been known by many. Because the government is good at playing with procedures, the entire project has been stuffed into the HKD 33.5 billion North-east New Territory funding, causing the media to focus onto forceful removal of villages and Real Estate tycoon disputes, where this Xinjiang Ling anti-terrorism base has been largely neglected.

The government has also learnt to put the description of anti-terrorism base in footnotes, making the font size hardly noticeable, when everyone is focusing on Anti-ELAB movement this May, they have easily took the fund of 1.9 billion to flatten the field. The bidding documents indicate that this November the developers would start working. (ref. 6)

Now, only just the land flattening in pre-development phase cost 1.9 billion, we are talking about an anti-terrorism standard of police facility, the estimate cost could be more than 10 billions at the end with no surprise. Till now, the cost for anti-terrorism base facility has no specific estimation, they are expecting after the land is flattened they could force into having the development fund for facility as well.

--Rejecting the Xingjiang Ling--

Right now, police force is using citizens on street around 18 districts as their shooting target training, playing vehicle drifting on crossroad, all sort of gun weapons have been trained already, there is definitely no need for a training base like this. Only thing is that killing weapons like the water cannon vehicles, sound wave blast cannon vehicles, if a remote area has been designated for them to practice insanely, their lethal force would not just be the level we see today. Therefore this tens of billion dollars anti-terrorist facility that will be used to abusecitizens must be opposed.

If the anti-terrorism base has no need and the land has been flattened already, the most practical resolution is to move the 18 Hectares Wong Chuk Hang police training school into there. Emptying an urban area for other land use, it is estimated that it could contain 1.3 (sic) residential unit to solve housing problem (ref. 7) The area in Hung Lung Hang should be reserved for Special Tactical Squad, otherwise they should not let them to develop anything there.

to be continued again

replies.msg:
In reality, Xinjiang has fallen to its current state with concentration camp, it is all according to the White Paper for Xinjiang issued by the State Council of the People's Republic of China (ref. 8). It all began with anti-terrorism base, and step by step it has been taken further to the concentration camp, the so-called “preventive measures for anti-terrorism“. Therefore to prevent Hong Kong from taking to this step of “preventive measures for anti-terrorism“, is to prevent the government from intruding Hong Kong using the name of anti-terrorism.

If to stop the violent abuses of the police force, then the anti-terrorism base project must be opposed, to give it an effective strike. If Lam is not using the “Emergency Regulations Ordinance“ to provide fund to the project, then it is expected to be requested from LegCo in this financial year. Please help to spread out the news, do more to monitor on this site, to stop Hong Kong from being Xinjiang-fied!





================

Source: 本土研究社 (Liber Research Community)
